about_the_game:
The Victorian Railways K class was one of the most successful classes of locomotive built for the Victorian Railways, built in several batches in 1922/23 (for the first series), and 1940-1946 for later versions, resulting in a class of 53 with a few variations. These versatile 2-8-0 Consolidation locomotives were designed for use on the light branchlines in Victoria, but saw use in all sorts of service, from branchline freight, mixed and passenger trains, through to mainline roadside goods service, yard shunters, and some mainline passenger use. This class saw use until the end of steam on the Victorian Railways and beyond, with K162 operating as the North Ballarat workshops pilot (shunter) until 1979. Now there are 4 currently preserved operational (3 on the mainline), these being K153, K183 and K190 with Steamrail Victoria, K163 at Mornington Railway, plus K160 under overhaul/restoration for the Victorian Goldfields Railway and many others statically preserved, stored, or under restoration around the state.

This pack features 4th series K class (single cab window, and boxpok wheels), K190, as preserved between 1979 and 1993 in 2 tone green with yellow lining in 4 variants to cover changes to the livery and details on the loco and tender over this period. These models are designed for broad gauge (5ft3in gauge) track.

These locos include the following features:
*Texture swapping with "Pristine", "Cleaned", and "Weathered" options, with automatic swapping on the tender to match the loco (randomises the livery when placed).
*Scripted exhaust steam/smoke effects that change depending on regulator, cutoff, coal level, season and weather.
*Scripted steam effects to change depending on season and weather.
*Scripted Cylinder drain steam and sound effects, operated using ALT+D or the cylinder drains lever in the cap.
*Other scripted steam and sound effects, including air compressor, brakes, and more.
*Working generator for lights, including steam and sound effects, controllable from properties, cab view, and keyboard controls.
*Number boards, marker lights and cab lights (in interior view) turn on when the generator is on.
*Variable glow on headlight depending on high/low beam and day or night time.
*Custom scripted 'quill' and 'pop' whistle options, via secondary and tertiary whistle controls.
*Highly detailed PBR materials.
*Heightmapped number plates, and other details.
*Highly detailed custom interior view, with operational controls, including functional gauge glass valves, and working cylinder drain cocks lever.
*Scripted, animated, reverser and valve gear in exterior and interior views.
*Animated dual automatic and screwlink couplers, and brake hoses/taps using ACS.
*Scripted Marker Lamps and Tail discs, with glow lamps (thanks to Bloodnok) - compatible with the VR Set Train Lamps driver command.
*Animated cab door, cab windows, smokebox door, staff exchanger, and tender tank filler lid.
*Cab doors, windows, and staff exchanger can be controlled from inside the cab as well as via the properties window.
*Deforming coal load animation in tender, giving realistic shape as coal is used.
*Light engine consists for each version of the locomotive.

Locos and tenders in this pack:
VR K190 2tg 79-80
VR K190 2tg 80-83
VR K190 2tg 83-86
VR K190 2tg Ten 79-86
VR K190 2tg 86-93
VR K190 2tg Ten 86-93

  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
